data.title: PRTG XL1 - The network monitoring solution from Paesler (16041)
data.meta_description: With the PRTG network monitoring solution from Paesler, you no longer leave the monitoring of your I... » Fast delivery ✅ Top support ✅
data.text:
Network monitoring is essential for the stability of the company network

It is Friday afternoon and shortly before closing time you receive more and more information from users who can no longer work. The logistics manager is standing tense in your office because he can no longer have orders picked. The deadline for dispatch is about to be broken. A nice idea for a Friday afternoon, isn't it?

This doesn't have to be the case any more! Many problems usually announce themselves slowly and insidiously. With a constant monitoring solution for your IT infrastructure, the above scenario would probably not have occurred.

The solution is - network monitoring with PRTG

Powerful and user-friendly software to monitor your entire network

Keep an eye on all systems, devices and data traffic at all times and be proactively informed about alerts and faults. Whether you're a small business or a medium-sized enterprise, the simple and scalable licensing model allows you to customise your network monitoring solution to meet your company's needs. Get started today with a free evaluation in your own environment.

5 reasons why you can trust PRTG Network Monitor

Centralised monitoring, to see your entire IT infrastructure in a single view

On-Premise installation for full control over your data, configuration and updates

Transparent licensing and fair pricing, that fit any budget and company size

High flexibility and easy scalability for IT, OT and IoT infrastructures

Companies from all industries worldwide trust our 20 years of monitoring experience

All PRTG monitoring features at a glance

Monitor everything in your IT, OT and IoT infrastructure - without being tied to a specific vendor integrated technologies Our monitoring software supports all major technologies and protocols intelligent network discovery Automatic network discovery sets up initial monitoring for you maps and dashboards Thanks to custom maps and dashboards, you get the overview of your entire infrastructure alerts and notifications Get real-time alerts via the notification channel of your choice (email, push, etc.) reporting Create customisable reports and integrate only the information you need. distributed monitoring Profit from distributed monitoring across an unlimited number of remote sites monitoring on the go Enjoy superior usability with our different user interfaces for web, desktop and mobile
